title: Didn't Get My Ward

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
So i got a pretty awesome ward the ''Urf Triumphant Ward'' from a chest so i upgraded it, but when i was gonna use it i couldn't find it. I looked at the store and it said i owned it.
[In My purchase history](https://gyazo.com/9bea2c52b4ce8e18d2c35156b2013bfa)
[It says i own it in the store](https://gyazo.com/b61a118b76cccfcdadc63a57d0a3f150)
So can you please help me? i was really excided to use it.

replies.body: There is an issue right now with some ward skins not being selectable.  They are unlocked on the account, but until the issue is fixed you won't be able to pick your specific ward.  While I don't have an ETA on a fix right now, I hope that helps clear things up!
